attributes.action: Make rail companies cut the prices of rail fares and tariffs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir

We the undersigned are unhappy with the extortionate prices for rail fares , tickets and tariffs to travel the national rail grid. 

We are most unhappy about the price inflation's expected to come into effect in 2009 and we feel seriously let down , especially as we face recession as a country.

Lower rail fares encourages less people to use their cars , 
encourages more people onto trains and other forms of public transport, will do wonders for the environment with less pollution and c02 emissions , especially in inner city and congested areas.

We hope you will take this petition into consideration.Because soon less and less people will use trains causing backlogs in traffic on major roads and heightened pollution to our atmosphere.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
